anomaly_lib.statistical package#

Submodules#

anomaly_lib.statistical.abod module#

class anomaly_lib.statistical.abod.ABOD(hyperparameter: dict, x_train: array, y_train: array = None, x_test: array = None, y_test: array = None)#

Bases: AlgorithmBase

fit()#

Fit detector. Adjusts the ABOD model using the training data.

Returns:

The outlier scores of the training data [0,1].

load_model(path_model)#

Loads the ABOD model from the specified file.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Path of the file where the model is located.

predict()#

Predict whether a particular sample is an outlier or not. Adjusts the ABOD model using the test data.

Returns:

Predict probability of outlier

save_model(path_model)#

Saves the ABOD model to the specified file.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Path of the file where the model will be saved.

set_hyperparameter(hyperparameter)#

Sets the hyperparameters of the model.

Args:

  • hyperparameter (dict): A dictionary containing the hyperparameters of the model.

Bases: AlgorithmBase

fit()#

Fit detector. Adjusts the Simple Exponential Smoothing model using the training data.

Returns:

The outlier scores of the training data.

load_model(path_model)#

Loads the Simple Exponential Smoothing model from the specified file.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Path of the file where the model is located.

predict()#

Predict whether a particular sample is an outlier or not. Adjusts the Simple Exponential Smoothing model using the test data.

Returns:

Predict probability of outlier

save_model(path_model)#

Saves the Simple Exponential Smoothing model to the specified file.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Path of the file where the model will be saved.

set_hyperparameter(hyperparameter)#

Sets the hyperparameters of the model.

Args:

  • hyperparameter (dict): A dictionary containing the hyperparameters of the model.

anomaly_lib.statistical.sod module#

class anomaly_lib.statistical.sod.SOD(hyperparameter: dict, x_train: array, y_train: array = None, x_test: array = None, y_test: array = None)#

Bases: AlgorithmBase

fit()#

Fit detector. Adjusts the SOD model using the training data.

Returns:

The outlier scores of the training data [0,1].

load_model(path_model)#

Loads the SOD model from the specified file.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Path of the file where the model is located.

predict()#

Predict whether a particular sample is an outlier or not. Adjusts the SOD model using the test data.

Returns:

Predict probability of outlier

save_model(path_model)#

Saves the SOD model to the specified file.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Path of the file where the model will be saved.

set_hyperparameter(hyperparameter)#

Sets the hyperparameters of the model.

Args:

  • hyperparameter (dict): A dictionary containing the hyperparameters of the model.

anomaly_lib.statistical.varmax module#

class anomaly_lib.statistical.varmax.VARMAX(hyperparameter: dict, x_train: array = None, y_train: array = None, x_test: array = None, y_test: array = None)#

Bases: AlgorithmBase

fit()#

Ajusta el modelo VARMAX utilizando los datos de entrenamiento.

Returns:

Residuals

load_model(path_model)#

Carga el modelo VARMAX desde el archivo especificado.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Ruta del archivo donde se encuentra el modelo.

Returns:

model: El modelo VARMAX cargado desde el archivo.

predict()#

Ajusta el modelo VARMAX utilizando los datos de entrenamiento.

Returns:

None

save_model(path_model)#

Guarda el modelo VARMAX en el archivo especificado.

Args:

  • path_model (str): Ruta del archivo donde se guardar el modelo.

Returns:

path_model (str): La ruta del archivo donde se guard el modelo.

set_hyperparameter(hyperparameter)#

Establece los hiperparmetros del modelo.

Args:

  • hyperparameter (dict): Un diccionario que contiene los hiperparmetros del modelo.

Returns:

None
